Token.Abstract: The AlfrescoOAuthHelper handles OAuth authentication processes.
this is an internal initialiser used for testing purposes only. Do not use for production services @param parameters
the authorization code retrieved from the Cloud server at first login

Parameter.Name: authorizationCode
Parameter.Abstract: the authorization code retrieved from the Cloud server at first login

Parameter.Name: oauthData
Parameter.Abstract: - the AlfrescoOAuthData. This object must have the api key, secret key and redirect URI set @param completionBlock

Token.Abstract: - the AlfrescoOAuthData, used for refreshing the access token. For that the AlfrescoOAuthData set needs to contain the api key, secret key, refresh token, and current access token @param completionBlock

Parameter.Name: oauthData
Parameter.Abstract: - the AlfrescoOAuthData, used for refreshing the access token. For that the AlfrescoOAuthData set needs to contain the api key, secret key, refresh token, and current access token @param completionBlock
